crystalline_forest.name: Crystalline Forest
crystalline_forest.description: A mystical forest where trees are made of shimmering crystal. Strange energies course through the air.

phoenix_temple.name: Temple of the Phoenix
phoenix_temple.description: An ancient temple dedicated to the mythical phoenix. Flames burn eternally within its halls.

elven_glade.name: Elven Glade
elven_glade.description: A sacred clearing in the elven lands, where nature and magic intertwine in perfect harmony.

shadow_realm.name: Shadow Realm
shadow_realm.description: A dimension where shadows come alive and darkness reigns supreme. Only the brave dare enter.
